name: @claudeautopm/plugin-databases
description: Complete database plugin with PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Redis, BigQuery, and Cosmos DB experts, database rules, and optimization scripts

commands.description: Database & Data Storage commands (5 total: db:query-analyze, db:db-optimize, db:schema-migrate, db:connection-pool, db:backup-restore)

agents.name: postgresql-expert
agents.description: PostgreSQL database design, optimization, and management. Expert in SQL queries, indexing strategies, performance tuning, replication, partitioning, and advanced features like JSONB and full-text search.

agents.name: mongodb-expert
agents.description: MongoDB database design, aggregation pipelines, and performance optimization. Expert in document modeling, sharding, replication, indexing strategies, and MongoDB Atlas.

agents.name: redis-expert
agents.description: Redis caching, pub/sub messaging, and data structure operations. Expert in Redis Cluster, persistence strategies, Lua scripting, and performance optimization.

agents.name: bigquery-expert
agents.description: BigQuery data warehouse design, SQL optimization, and analytics engineering. Expert in partitioning, clustering, materialized views, BigQuery ML, and cost optimization.

agents.name: cosmosdb-expert
agents.description: Azure Cosmos DB design and optimization across all APIs (Core SQL, MongoDB, Cassandra, Gremlin, Table). Expert in global distribution, consistency levels, partitioning strategies, and cost optimization.

rules.name: database-management-strategy
rules.description: Required strategy for managing databases across all project environments with Context7-verified best practices

rules.name: database-pipeline
rules.description: Critical database operations pipelines for migrations, optimization, data warehousing, caching, and backups

scripts.name: postgres-index-analyze
scripts.description: Analyze PostgreSQL indexes for unused indexes, hit ratio, and missing foreign key indexes

scripts.name: mongodb-shard-check
scripts.description: Check MongoDB sharded collection index consistency across all shards

scripts.name: redis-cache-stats
scripts.description: Analyze Redis cache performance including hit/miss ratio, memory usage, and slow log

scripts.name: bigquery-cost-analyze
scripts.description: Analyze BigQuery costs and optimization opportunities including storage and partitioning

scripts.name: cosmosdb-ru-optimize
scripts.description: Analyze Azure Cosmos DB RU/s optimization and partition distribution

postgresql_database.description: PostgreSQL relational database with advanced features

mongodb_database.description: MongoDB document database with sharding and aggregation

redis_caching.description: Redis in-memory caching and pub/sub messaging

bigquery_warehouse.description: BigQuery data warehouse with ML and analytics

cosmosdb_database.description: Azure Cosmos DB multi-model globally distributed database

database_optimization.description: Query optimization, indexing, and performance tuning

connection_pooling.description: Connection pool optimization for PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB, and Redis

cost_optimization.description: Database cost analysis and optimization strategies
